Pre-Game Insights: West Indies boast additional firepower with Powell, Andre Russell, Shimron Hetmyer, Sherfane Rutherford, and Romario Shepherd, making them one of the most formidable batting line-ups in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies will also be looking to become the first team to win a T20 World Cup at home
Others: The West Indies A's recent tour to Nepal, grabbing eight wickets in five matches by Obed McCoy
